group_1.textRight: So the person we give chocolates to can@just be "someone who cares for us,"
and doesn't have to be@"a special someone".
Mii has lots of people like that!

group_1.textCenter: I heard my name coming from the phone.
*Chuckle...* Now what could it have been for?@You'll have to wait and find out...

group_1.textRight: Of course there's Big Sis,@and Mama, and Papa...
Grandma and Grandpa are important too!
And there's my teacher who went@on maternity leave!
Everyone is special to Mii,@so I wanna give everyone chocolate!

group_1.textLeft: (I see, I CAN give chocolates@to people I live with.)
(In that case...I want to give some@to Livia and Yozuru...)
(They're very important to me...@And they take care of me...)

group_1.narration: Mii is going to give@to Nayuta and Rabi,
but I wonder if I should give them@something too...
They've helped me a few times...@And among the people of Kamihama,@I do talk to them more often...
I don't know how they feel about me,@but they're close to my friend,
so I should give to them...@It can be my way to tell them to@please continue looking after Mii.
For the same reason,@I would like to give to Mitama too.@We've practically never talked@to each other, but...
would it be weird if her little sister's friend@just suddenly gave her chocolates...?
I don't know how to get@a sense for these things.
And then there's the Tomorrow Shop's granny,@and the kids I met there...
Ahh, but if I give to them,@I feel like I should give to other Magical Girls too...
Thinking back on it,@there's a lot of people who have taken care of me,@so even if it's just as Coordinator to customer,@maybe I should give to them too?@I don't know.
Huh? I'm starting to think the fifty pieces@from going halfsies with Mii isn't enough...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, big time. I have no idea@who I should give to.
There's maybe only a few nice people@I'm really close to,
but I feel like there's around a hundred@nice people I'm sort of close to...

group_1.textRight: Totally! Mii knows that feel too.
If you give to this person, then there's that person...@And then it goes on and on and on in your head!

group_1.textLeft: There has to be somewhere@you can draw the line...

group_1.textRight: Maybe...make an important person@ranking to take care of that...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... Give to the top fifty people...
Yeah...I'm the one who brought it up,@but I don't like this...
If the fifty-first kid found out,@they would never recover from the shock...

group_1.textRight: "why give to that kid when they don't@hang out with you as much as me"...

group_1.textLeft: Even though they would both still@be important to me...
Relationships sure are complicated,@with so much to think about.
